info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:33AM CDT until July 05 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN COOK COUNTY... At 1232 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Park Ridge, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Evanston, Skokie, Des Plaines, Mount Prospect, Glenview, Ohare Airport, Wheeling, Park Ridge, Northbrook, Niles, West Ridge, Lake View, Irving Park, Lincoln Park, Wilmette, Norridge, Edgewater, Rogers Park and Albany Park. This includes... Loyola University, Oakton Community College, Northeastern Illinois University, Northwestern University, and Wrigley Field. Including the following interstates... I-90 between mile markers 75 and 84. I-94 between mile markers 26 and 45. I-294 between mile markers 26 and 45. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
